tool_description: Create controllable Human-Like Summaries of reviews/opinions about a place/product etc. Generate Micro-Content from phrases and Much More!

api_list.name: GetMicroContent
api_list.description:
GetMicroContent - This Endpoint lets you generate Micro Content from points/phrases.
it has the following keys-value:
1. "content": Pass a list/Array of phrases/words.More the better.
2. "beam_size": (1-5) for faster Generation keep it lower (1), for better content generation keep it high (5)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://human-like-opinion-summarization.p.rapidapi.com/generate_micro_content"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "human-like-opinion-summarization.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetSentSumm
api_list.description:
**GetSentSumm** Lets you generate controllable (length and sentiment) summaries from reviews/opinions.

Following are the Keys Values:
1. "content" : Pass an array/list of reviews/opinions in here, more the better!
2. "sentiment" : Define the sentiment here:- 
                  1. "neu" : for neutral summary
                  2. "pos" : for positive summary
                  3. "neg" : for negative summary
3. "length": it is the number of opinions you want to have generated. for better summaries keep it > 4.
4. "beam_size": (1-5) for faster results keep it lower (1) , for better summaries keep it higher (5)
